title: left-facing fist: medium-light skin tone

nouns: The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.
Hand with the fingers curled into the palm
The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.
A fist is an action where a hand has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles.
A hand that has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles
Hand with the fingers clenched or curled inward
A hand with the fingers clenched in the palm (as for hitting)

description: This version of the  Left-facing Fist emoji has the  Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin Tone on su
apple_vendor_description: The left-facing fist emoji on Apple devices, in a medium-light skin tone, is depicted with robust shading and a subtle gloss that emphasizes its solid form and strength. Its rounded knuckles and the slight curve of the wrist give it a dynamic, ready-to-engage appearance, embodying power and solidarity. This emoji on Apple devices is a versatile symbol of support, agreement, or a call to action, often used to convey a sense of unity or determination.
